name: sofu.vim
description:
Provides simple highlighting for sofu files, which are used in some projects:
For more information on sofu see http://sofu.sf.net

Normaly these files get autodetected as "conf", which is o.k., but this script provides a better highlighting.

Based somewhat on the included conf.vim
install_details:
Just copy into the global syntax folder or your private one and if you want auto-detection add

au BufRead,BufNewFile *.sofu			setf sofu

in either filetype.vim or your own ftdetect/sofu.vim
